channel.title: [SHOWOFF]: (Delta) Server music and sounds
channel.description:
[size=14pt]I don't know if I posted in the right section...?[/size]
317 Delta with music and sound effects.. I've only added sounds for a few weapons so far, teleporting, bone burying, and food and potion drinking.
Recorded with fraps:
Please note that fraps messed up how the cursor was viewed, so it seems as though my cursor is way off of clicking the stuff ingame..
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oD_qFfiDpQU&feature=player_detailpage
All sounds are from the client.

item.title: [SHOWOFF]: (Delta) Server music and sounds
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

[quote=“zach55200, post:21, topic:403743”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=500807.msg3806595#msg3806595 date=1320523381]

I have seen a tutorial for this lol! So either way not his work.
[/quote]The tutorial shows you how to add them client-sided…

He added them server sided + he added all of those sounds, the tutorial gives you 1.

Oh really? he didnt add the server sided either http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514356.0.html

and http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514357.0.html[/quote]

That’s probably the shittiest way I’ve seen a music/sound system handled. I added my sounds and music differently, and those don’t even work with my source.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF]: (Delta) Server music and sounds
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“kingdomkey01, post:10, topic:403743”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=500807.msg3664932#msg3664932 date=1310571119]
it’s one of the best delta’s ive seen in a while, although i dont like the gameframe if you could get that to the original 459 gameframe id be really impressed
[/quote]

That can be arranged :D, I’ll just have to finish up the icons on the skills interface… I’ll do it now.[/quote]
Nonono. Keep 2 client versions. One with old gameframe and one with new gameframe. I personally love the old gameframe.

Read full topic

item.title: [SHOWOFF]: (Delta) Server music and sounds
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“kingdomkey01, post:6, topic:403743”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=500807.msg3664227#msg3664227 date=1310517945]
You seem to be updating the sounds via the Walking packets?

I do believe the updated via the player region update.
[/quote]

That’s right :D. Regions are checked everytime a player walks… There may be a better system, but this works.[/quote]

Regions are checked, but not updated every time a player walks. The player’s region is only updated if it walks into a new region.

Read full topic
